name: Race n Rush: Racing Car Road
name_original: Race n Rush: Racing Car Road
description:
Race n Rush is a funny racing game that will challenge your reaction time and reflexes. Once you start play you won't be able to stop. Up for the challenge?

Your mission is to rush trough the city traffic with your pick up truck or car and deliver food.

All you have to do is tap on the screen to turn left, right or jump. Don't forget to collect coins on the road. You can use them to unlock new awesome vehicles.

Get the game right now and start playing with you friend to see who gets the highest score. Have fun and enjoy!
